text.section: A sponsor may file one or more applications in accordance with the schedules that the Department establishes.

section.section: The Smart Growth Subcabinet, on the recommendation of the Secretary, may designate an area as a sustainable community.

If the Smart Growth Subcabinet has not acted within 90 days of a recommendation from the Secretary, the Secretary may designate an area as a sustainable community without the approval of the Smart Growth Subcabinet.
